content.rendered:
[vc_row el_id=”installation”][vc_column]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Easy Installation &
One click Demo Importer

All installation and importing process are from your website admin dashboard, Simply you can upload theme zip file and activate your theme with purchase code and then install the theme then in the next step install plugins and finally you can import a demo from our demos collection. Your website will be exactly look like a demo site.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593501929258{background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”page_builder”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Drag & Drop
Live Page Builder

XTRA theme comes with one of the most popular page builders in the world, WPBakery page builder is fully drag and drop system that will allow you to create different pages for your website. You can access over 70 elements and over 200 premade section templates. WPBakery supports both back-end and front-end page builder with a good performance. 

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”templates”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

200+
Prebuilt Section Templates

XTRA has over 200 premade section templates that you can use on your website pages. Templates are made by multiple elements with stylish design, they will help you to create different sections on your website quick and easy. By choosing one of the templates, page builder will add it to your page and you can start editing elements inside added section.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593501972864{background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”theme_options”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Theme Options
Live & Quick, 1000+ Options

XTRA theme have powerful live theme options that you can see any changes before publish on your website. There are over 1000+ options which will allow you to design and setup your website exactly as you want. All theme options fields are categorized in WordPress customize page. 

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”stylekit”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

StyleKit Feature
Design Everything With Ease

StyleKit is a special feature developed exclusively for XTRA WordPress Theme, You can’t find such a unique feature anywhere else. With this special feature, you will be able to apply a special style to all components of your site without any coding skills. Designing a site to your liking is no longer a chore because you can design and modify all sections as you like with StyleKit. You can adjust everything such as color, sizes, spaces, typography, and a lot more with ease.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593502161263{background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”typography”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Typography &
1500+ Icons Library

Search engines will love your website and always you will get a good result in searches, XTRA theme also is fully compatible with other SEO plugins such as WP YOAST plugin. All standards is has been observed.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”header_footer”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Live Header
and Footer Builder

With live Header and Footer builder you can create any type of header and footer for your website. For header you can add rows up to 3 and add elements left, center and in right positions. There are over 15 elements that you can add to your header and footer, such as Menu, Search, Logo, Shop cart, Text, etc.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593502129723{background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”seo”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

SEO and
Speed Performance

Search engines will love your website and always you will get a good result in searches, XTRA theme also is fully compatible with other SEO plugins such as WP YOAST plugin. All standards has been observed, By testing our XTRA demos in GTMetrix you can see the speed and low server requests. 

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”woo”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

WooCommerce Ready
Start Selling Your Products

Start selling your products and create your own online store with professional XTRA shop demos based on WooCommerce plugins and its add-ones. You can sell both physical and downloadable products easily and earn money. All XTRA theme demos have shop pages with different designs that you can simply import the demo. There are over 50 options for setting up and design your shop pages. 

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593502089139{background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”edd”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Easy Digital
Downloads Ready

XTRA theme is compatible with Easy digital downloads plugin. You can create your online digital shop and start selling your goods such as Audio, Books, videos, and any downloadable and online files. Theme also have some settings and StyleKits for EDD which you can change your shop design. 

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”automatic_updates”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Automatic Updates
with Dashboard Notification

XTRA theme and plugins supports Automatic Updates feature that means you will get notification about updates in your website dashboard and easily you can update theme and plugins by single clicks. WordPress automatic updates also are safe and faster than manually update solution. You will never lose new updates and be up to date always.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593502089139{background-color: #282828 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Advanced &
Powerful Mega Menu

XTRA have builtin powerful mega menu system which will allow you to create any type of mega menu such as columns megamenu with children, custom page as mega menu (You can create it with page builder), and custom shortcake mode that will allow you to add custom HTML or shortcode.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner el_class=”cz_reverse_row”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

RTL Languages,
Multilingual Supports

XTRA theme is fully compatible with WPML multilingual translation plugin and also some other free translation plugins. All XTRA demos are fully RTL and translation ready that means you can use any demos in RTL language mode. With WPML plugin any part of theme is translatable in any languages. 

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column]

Other Features

_
[vc_row_inner el_class=”no_padding”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Performance

XTRA is a lightweight WP theme and its loading time is faster than 95% of other websites & themes

Sticky Sidebars

By turning on Sticky Sidebars option, sidebar will stick on page scrolling

50+ Custom Elements

In page builder you can access over 50 custom elements plus WordPress widgets

Google Fonts

In XTRA theme you have access to over 1445 popular google web fonts

Icons Library

With over 1500 icons, you can design great sections and services boxes
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

18 Custom Widgets

There are 18 custom widget that you can use them in your blog or pages sidebars

Child Theme Support

If you want to add any custom PHP functions or files, you can use child theme

Different Menus

5 Different Menu types fullscreen, off canvas, dropdown, list and fixed dots

WP Editor Fonts

You can add any custom or google fonts into WP Editor for further usage

Live Search

Fonts and icons library supports live search and easily you can find what you want
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

30+ Gallery Styles

Over 30 styles for Gallery and Posts elements which also you can mix designs

WP Multisite Support

Fully compatible with WP Multisite and plugins also can be update through network dashboard

Parallax Elements

Parallax feature support on scroll and by mouse with different depth numbers

Wide and Boxed

Layout supports both Full wide, Boxed mode and also boxed with some margins

Responsive Mode

You can’t find any theme to change typography on different devices, but XTRA have it
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
